tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I would highly recommend Dr Naga Murali, I have been referred by local MD to him, his way of explanation regarding the treatment plan and current situation is very satisfactory...most importantly preparing the patient mentally before going for the surgery is excellent...I will give him 10/10.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Naga Murali is very much experienced and efficient Cardiologist and very good at understanding the patients problem and diagnose the problem with care. He has given on time treatment to my father in law and saved him. I recommend him any kind of heart problems. Thanks.

Consulted Dr Murali sir for my mother who felt heartpain and shortness of breath. Quick advise and medical remedies of Dr Murali sir  helped us to rule out the cardiac problems. Thank a lot to Dr Murali sir for the timely treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The Doctor was friendly and reassuring. The hospital was clean. The staff was helpful. Overall a good experience.
my mom had low bp for 3 days. i told them it was urgent but the doctors hasn't  at all. we waited for 1 and half hour.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We went for my dad heart checkup. Dr. Listened very patiently and advised tests to rule out the exact issue. I am quite satisfied with the dr and his treatment. Gave minimal medicine apt to the problem.

Doctor is good, but due to so many patients he will spend less than 5 minutes with the patients. I was having questions but he was in so hurry as so many patients waiting outside. 
Not recommended if you want to discuss in detail or have questions.
There will be two staff members along with doctor waiting to escort you outside and call another patient. Rs 750 for 3 or 4 minutes of consultation.
